Classes in com.compendium.core.db.management used by com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
DBDatabaseManager
          This class, with the help of the DBConnectionManager, opens connections for databases.
 

Classes in com.compendium.core.db.management used by com.compendium.core.db
DBConnection
          This class is a wrapper class for a Connection object, and stores additional information about its state.
 

Classes in com.compendium.core.db.management used by com.compendium.core.db.management
DBAdminDatabase
          This class is responsible for creating and accessing the administration database that Compendium uses for maintaining the list of user created database and global system properties.

DBDatabaseNameException
          Signals that the requested database name already exists.

          Signals that the requested database type is unknown.
